::K9::

K9 ran over to Hot Rod.
"Matrix, forgive me." He managed to get Hot Rod on his back, and started
running to the CF.

::DrillBit::

"Whatever we do, it better be fast, Phobia. KitKat wont last much
longer." He said, with tears.
